import { useState } from 'react' const Login = ({ onSignIn }) => { const [user, setUser] = useState('') const [pass, setPass] = useState('') const [remember, setRemember] = useState(false) const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if(!text){ alert('Please add a task') } onSignIn({ text, day, reminder, data }) setText('') setDay('') setReminder(false) } return (
setText(e.target.value)}/>
setDay(e.target.value)}/>
setData(e.target.value)}/>
setReminder(e.currentTarget.checked)}/>
) } export default Login
